#summary The navigator.productSub property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property

== Values ==

The `navigator.productSub` property returns a string.
  * [BrowserFamilyFirefox Firefox] returns the date the browser was compiled.  Example: `"20070515"`
  * [BrowserFamilySafari Safari] returns a date of unknown origin.  Example: `"20030107"`

This property is read-only.
